    • Method Detail

      • getGroup

        public Group getGroup(int groupId)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves a group object with groupname,groupId and the id of the administrator from database
        Parameters:
        groupId - Id of group.
        Returns:
        Returns the group if found, else null.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQLException if connection is not successful.

      • getGroupByName

        public java.util.List<Group> getGroupByName(java.lang.String name)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves a list of groups given the groupname as a argument from the database. NOTE: There could be several groups with same name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of group.
        Returns:
        A List of groups with same name as argument. Null if no groups with the name exists in database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQLException if connection is not successful.

      • getAllGroups

        public java.util.List<Group> getAllGroups()
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all the groups from database.
        Returns:
        Returns a List of groups if found. Null if empty.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQLException if connection is not successful.

      • getGroups

        public java.util.List<Group> getGroups(int amountOfGroups)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        amountOfGroups - Number of groups you wish to receive.
        Returns:
        A list of X amount of groups from database. Null if no groups exist in database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQLException if connection is not successful.
